definition.text: To manage pull requests from within the app, you must first provide your Github.com credentials so that the Client can get you authenticated when while accessing Github.com.

paragraphs.text: Github Credentials are Missing. Please solve this issue and try again.

To solve this issue follow the following instructions on how to set up your GitHub.com credentials so that the system can automate the tasks needed to submit your contributions to the main repository of the Superalgos project.
Github Credentials are Missing. The Hierarchy APIs was not found at your workspace. Please create it following the guide below and try again.
Anchor Github API Node Not Found
Github Credentials are Missing. The Hierarchy APIs does not have a child of type Github API. Please create it following the guide below and try again.
Anchor Config Property Username Not Found
Github Credentials are Missing. The property username is missing or empty. Please create it following the guide below and try again.
Anchor Config Property Token Not Found
Github Crendentials are Missing. The property token is missing or empty. Please create it following the guide below and try again.
